alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 07 at 11:26AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Another round of thunderstorms with heavy rain is possible tonight. Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall may be possible. * WHERE...Portions of west central Illinois, southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri, including the following areas, in west central Illinois, Hancock, Henderson and McDonough. In southeast Iowa, Des Moines, Henry IA, Jefferson, Lee and Van Buren. In northeast Missouri, Clark and Scotland. * WHEN...Through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
